DOC.brief_summary: The objective of this study is to evaluate the microbiome composition of infant's (9-12 month) skin experiencing diaper rash in order to determine if the onset and severity of erythema associated with diaper rash is influenced by the type of bacteria colonizing the skin.
DOC.criteria: Infants aged 912 months with mild to moderate diaper rash Use of topical or oral antibiotics or antifungals within the past 4 weeks. Use of zinccontaining diaper rash creams within 48 hours first sample Immunocompromised
